text: Herman Bing (March 30, 1889 – January 9, 1947) was a German-American character actor and voice actor. He was the brother of Gus Bing (1893–1967). He shot himself on 9 January, 1947. ==Other websites== * Category:German movie actors Category:German voice actors Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:1889 births Category:1947 deaths
title: Herman Bing
